subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The starting defensive end Lawrence Wilson broke his right leg midway through the second quarter of No. 11 Ohio State’s opener against visiting Youngstown State yesterday.Wilson, a 6-foot-6, 276-pound junior, grabbed the starting job last spring and was expected to be a force up front for the Buckeyes. A year ago he had 17 tackles, including five for negative yardage, and 3 sacks.Wilson was hurt with the Buckeyes leading 14-0.
